description: Retrieves the details of a custom pattern by specifying its name.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the custom pattern that you want to retrieve.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the custom pattern that you retrieved.

nested_items.name: RegexString
nested_items.description: A regular expression string that is used for detecting sensitive data in a custom pattern.

nested_items.name: ContextWords
nested_items.description: A list of context words if specified when you created the custom pattern. If none of these context words are found within the vicinity of the regular expression the data will not be detected as sensitive data.
